Diverge [i](Pick only one path as a sorcery to gain that type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
[i]To keep his own mind would be a madness all of its own.[/i]
{4}{G}{G}: Eldrazi
Create a number of 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature tokens equal to the number of differently named lands you control.
{3}{U}{U}: Cultist
Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Cultist.
